item.title: About Us
item.description:
NubeStack delivers enterprise-grade cloud solutions, consulting, and managed services designed to simplify cloud adoption and accelerate digital transformation. We empower businesses with secure, scalable, and innovative technology, leveraging the power of open-source and cloud-native solutions to drive efficiency and growth.

Our Vision

To be the trusted partner for organizations looking to modernize IT infrastructure, harness innovation, and unlock the full potential of the cloud.

Our Values

  • Innovation – Driving continuous improvement and embracing forward-thinking technology.
  • Integrity – Building trust through transparency, accountability, and reliability.
  • Open Technology – Delivering opensource, future-ready solutions and avoiding vendor lock-in.
  • Customer Success – Partnering with clients to achieve measurable business outcomes.

item.title: Container Orchestration
item.description:
Container Orchestration

Scalable and secure Kubernetes solutions for managing containerized applications across cloud environments with enterprise-grade security and 99.9% uptime guarantee.

item.title: Data Sovereignty Solved: On-Prem Compliance with Ceph Storage
item.description: How a financial services company achieved strict data residency compliance by provisioning on-prem Ceph storage clusters with NubeStack.

item.title: Industry Solutions
item.description:
Industry Solutions

Welcome to our industry solutions page. Explore how NubeStack empowers different sectors with tailored cloud and technology services.

Telecommunications

Through extensive collaboration with telecom providers, NubeStack has developed deep expertise in cloud, NFV, and network automation. We help telecom organizations modernize their infrastructure, deploy next-generation networks, and accelerate digital transformation initiatives. Our services cover virtualized network functions, edge and core cloud deployments, and fully automated network orchestration, enabling operators to improve service delivery, reduce operational costs, and scale efficiently.

item.title: Infrastructure Automation
item.description:
Infrastructure Automation

Automate your IT infrastructure deployment with IaC (Terraform/Ansible) to reduce provisioning time, enhance consistency, ensure disaster recovery, and lower costs.

item.title: Managed Services
item.description:
Managed Services

We provide 24/7 monitoring, maintenance, and support to ensure your cloud infrastructure runs smoothly and efficiently.

item.title: Multi-Cloud Agility: Kubernetes Migration and Vendor Lock-in Reduction
item.description: How a technology provider achieved true multi-cloud portability and massive cost savings by standardizing on OpenStack and Kubernetes with NubeStack’s guidance.

item.title: NFV Solutions
item.description:
NFV Solutions

Incorporate Telco and HPC grade low-latency NFV technologies like SRIOV, DPDK, and OVN to accelerate cloud network performance.

item.title: Private/Public Cloud Solutions
item.description:
Private/Public Cloud Solutions

OpenStack, OpenShift, AWS, Azure, and GCP based cloud solutions for building, managing, and scaling private and public clouds with flexibility, security, and cost-effectiveness.

Our Cloud Services

  • Private cloud design and deployment (OpenStack, OpenShift)
  • Public cloud migration and management (AWS, Azure, GCP)
  • Hybrid and multi-cloud strategies
  • Enterprise-grade security and compliance
  • 99.9% uptime guarantee
  • 24/7 support

Ready to transform your business with the right cloud solution? Contact us today!

item.title: Zero Trust in Google Cloud: Mitigating Data Exfiltration Risk
item.description: A global e-commerce platform successfully implemented a Zero Trust architecture and VPC Service Controls on Google Cloud with NubeStack to protect sensitive assets.

item.title: DevOps Services
item.description:
DevOps Services

Streamline your development and operations with our comprehensive DevOps solutions.

Our DevOps Expertise

Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD)

  • Automated build pipelines
  • Testing automation
  • Deployment automation
  • Code quality checks

Infrastructure as Code (IaC)

  • Terraform and CloudFormation
  • Ansible and Puppet
  • Kubernetes orchestration
  • Docker containerization

Monitoring & Logging

  • Application performance monitoring
  • Infrastructure monitoring
  • Log aggregation and analysis
  • Alert management

DevOps Tools We Use

  • Version Control: Git, GitLab, GitHub
  • CI/CD: Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions
  • Containerization: Docker, Kubernetes
  • Monitoring: Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack
  • Cloud Platforms: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud

Benefits of Our DevOps Approach

  • Faster Deployment: Reduce time to market
  • Improved Quality: Automated testing and monitoring
  • Better Collaboration: Bridge development and operations
  • Scalability: Handle growth efficiently

Implementation Process

  1. Assessment: Evaluate current processes
  2. Strategy: Design DevOps roadmap
  3. Implementation: Set up tools and pipelines
  4. Training: Team education and best practices
  5. Optimization: Continuous improvement

Transform your development workflow with DevOps. Contact us to get started!

item.title: Web Development
item.description:
Web Development

Professional web development services to bring your digital vision to life.

Our Development Services

Frontend Development

  • Responsive web design
  • React, Vue.js, Angular
  • Progressive Web Apps (PWA)
  • Mobile-first approach

Backend Development

  • RESTful APIs
  • Database design
  • Server architecture
  • Performance optimization

Full-Stack Solutions

  • End-to-end development
  • Modern frameworks
  • Scalable architecture
  • Cross-platform compatibility

Technologies We Use

  • Frontend: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, Vue.js
  • Backend: Node.js, Python, PHP, Java
  • Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL
  • Cloud: AWS, Google Cloud, Azure

Development Process

  1. Requirements Analysis: Understanding your needs
  2. Design & Planning: Creating the roadmap
  3. Development: Building your solution
  4. Testing: Ensuring quality and performance
  5. Deployment: Launch and maintenance

Ready to build your web presence? Get in touch!

item.title: Strengthening Cloud Security with Zero Trust and VPC Service Controls
item.description:
As organizations continue their digital transformation journeys, securing cloud environments has become more critical than ever. Traditional perimeter-based security is no longer sufficient in a world where workloads are distributed across hybrid and multi-cloud environments.

Enter the Zero Trust model — a modern approach to cloud security that assumes no user, device, or service is inherently trusted. Combined with Google Cloud’s VPC Service Controls, enterprises can significantly reduce data exfiltration risks, strengthen compliance, and maintain strict control over sensitive assets.

item.title: Cloud Data Sovereignty Challenges and On-Prem Storage Solutions
item.description:
As enterprises increasingly adopt cloud technologies, data sovereignty and compliance have become critical concerns. Organizations must ensure that sensitive data remains within specific geographic or regulatory boundaries while still enabling modern cloud workloads.

NubeStack helps enterprises address these challenges by provisioning on-prem Ceph storage clusters, allowing public and private workloads to access data securely without ever leaving the organization’s premises.

item.title: VMware State and OpenStack Migrations
item.description:
Virtualization has been the backbone of modern IT infrastructure for over a decade. VMware continues to be a dominant player, powering enterprise data centers with robust virtualization, management tools, and integrated solutions. However, many organizations are now exploring OpenStack as a flexible, open-source alternative to reduce vendor lock-in, enable cloud-native workloads, and achieve cost optimization.

In this post, we explore the current state of VMware environments, the challenges organizations face during migration, and how NubeStack can help enterprises successfully transition to OpenStack-based cloud solutions.

item.title: Services
item.description:
Our Services

Cloud Solutions

We provide comprehensive cloud infrastructure and deployment solutions.

Web Development

Custom web applications and responsive websites built with modern technologies.

Mobile App Development

Native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android.

DevOps & Infrastructure

Continuous integration, deployment pipelines, and infrastructure automation.

Consulting Services

Technical consulting and architecture design for your projects.
